title.narrative: Support to the formulation of Vietnam Statistical Development Strategy for the period 2021-2030 and vision to 2045

description.narrative: This project aims at assisting the Vietnam Institute of Statistical Science in the formulation of Vietnam Statistics Development Strategy for the period 2021-2030 and vision to 2045, particularly in the field of social statistics and environmental statistics. The project has two main outputs as follows: - A workshop to discuss the draft VSDS for the period 2021-2030 and vision to 2045 and technical inputs from international and national experts - Identification of the global development trends of social statistics and environmental statistics and recommendations for Vietnam.

title.narrative: Support the formulation of the Vietnam Statistical Development Strategy for the period 2021-2030 and vision to 2045 with a focus on social statistics and environmental statistics

Relevant inputs and recommendations, including major development orientations for social statistics and environmental statistics, provided to the formulation of Vietnam Statistical Development Strategy for the period 2021-2030 and vision to 2045
